nodes.text: Mumble's Turnaround was an Outer Rim Territories hyperspace route that ran from the planet Tatooine through the worlds of Ryloth and Seylott, then terminated at the planet Roon. Ryloth acted as a junction been the Turnaround and the Corellian Run hyperspace route. The route also overlapped with the Spice Triangle, a series of trade routes linking Roon, Tatooine and Ryloth. The former pirate Queen Maz Kanata marked Mumble's Turnaround as one of the "real" trade routes to be used by smugglers, as opposed to the official ones, on a map that she included in the book that would become known as the Smuggler's Guide.
Mumble's Turnaround was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
